item.title: Encrypt Filesystem / 加密文件系统
item.description: Dm-crypt 加密文件系统镜像 数据包准备 安装 root# emerge -avq sys-fs/lvm2 root# emerge -avq sys-fs/cryptsetup 检查dm-crpyt是否已经加载 $ ls -l /dev/mapper/control # 接下来加载dm-crypt内核模块： $ sudo modprobe dm-crypt # dm

item.title: Adduser to Linux
item.description: Add user to linux useradd -m -G users,wheel username passwd username Add user to Samba smbpasswd -a user Add a user to a group usermod -a -G examplegroup exampleusername Convert a user to nologin shell usermod -s /sbin/nologin exampleusername

item.title: Gentoo_Overlay
item.description: Add local overlay Create directory mkdir -p /usr/local/portage/metadata echo "masters = gentoo" > /usr/local/portage/metadata/layout.conf chown -R portage:portage /usr/local/portage/ Modify make.conf PORTDIR_OVERLAY="/usr/local/portage/ ${PORTDIR_OVERLAY}" Add [local] part to /etc/portage/repos.conf/gentoo.conf [local] location = /usr/local/portage auto-syc = no Add a local ebuild sudo cp -r /usr/portage/net-p2p/transmission /usr/local/portage cd /usr/local/portage ebuild transmission-2.92-r2.ebuild manifest

item.title: MountWindow
item.description: On MAC System Keep Network Drives Mounted on Mac OS X using Autofs Copy from Edit /etc/auto_master /mnt/cifs is home of mount point # Automounter master map # +auto_master # Use directory service /net -hosts -nobrowse,hidefromfinder,nosuid /home auto_home -nobrowse,hidefromfinder /Network/Servers -fstab /- -static /mnt/cifs auto_nas Edit /etc/auto_nas new_tdx -fstype=smbfs,soft,noowners,noatime,nosuid ://user:passwd@192.168.0.18/new_tdx [OPTIONAL] Security sudo chmod 600 /etc/auto_nas ####– Create mount directory mkdir -p /mnt/cifs/new_tdx Test auto mount sudo automount -vc Should see some output similar to this
